pullRequest.title: Add notification BEFORE nmz overload expires
pullRequest.bodyText:
Addressing feature request #4279
Currently there is no option to display notifications BEFORE an overload potion expires in nmz, either in the Nightmare Zone plugin or NMZ Utilies plugin.
Proposed change in nightmarezone plugin:

Config option for adjusting how early to output notification

nodes.bodyText: Why is this not just overloadNotificationSend = false? It looks like this would break if you flipped the plugin off/on while overloaded currently.

Duration overloadWarningOffset = OVERLOAD_DURATION.minus(Duration.ofSeconds(config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds()));

can just be here. It isn't necessary to store the config value yourself.
Probably the overloadNotificationSend / config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds() checks should just be in here instead then.

beforeCommit.message: Add notification BEFORE nmz overload expires

commit.message:
nmz plugin: add option to send overload notification prior to expire

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>

afterCommit.message:
nmz plugin: add option to send overload notification prior to expire

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>
